long_description: Welcome to the Loading Dock. As you take in your surroundings you are happy to see the lack of aliens in this space. Not much draws your attention in the room except for the two heavy doors on either side of the space. These doors are different from those separating the other rooms of the ship. Their size and shape indicate that they must be airlock doors able to withstand and protect the ship from the vacuum of space. The door on the opposite side of the room from where you entered is thankfully closed! Just next to this door is what appears to be a small set of instructions and a big red button. You are somewhat comforted by the fact that even among the vast and diverse life forms that populate our universe, you are bound to find a big red button almost anywhere you go. As you continue to look around you see another smaller door. Upon further inspection, you see a small sign on this door with a picture of what looks like a tool set.
short_description: You are in the Loading Dock. Connections through two heavy doors are available too the Escape Pod and EVA Prep Chamber. Another small door leads to the Maintence Room. A large red button is seen on the wall.

inventory_list.description: this is the key to the pod
inventory_list.name: key
